A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Oh man\, what a terrible Star Wars movie. I waited and waited to see it after everyone kept telling me not to waste my time and when I finally saw it\, I realized I should have watched the prequels instead. I liked the special effects and Luke's Jedi beard. I hated everything else. I am actually surprised the audience score is this high (about 50%) because I don't know anyone who likes this movie.
